name: arch::cpu::cpuid::query_xstate_max_features

arch::cpu::cpuid::cpuid.doc:
Executes the CPUID instruction for the given leaf and subleaf.

 This method will return `None` if the leaf is not supported.

core::ops::ControlFlow: Unknown([Downcast(VariantIdx(0, ThreadLocalIndex)), Field(0, Ty { id: 782, kind: RigidTy(Adt(AdtDef(DefId { id: 3332, name: "core::arch::x86_64::CpuidResult" }), GenericArgs([]))) })])

doc: Queries the supported XSTATE features, i.e., the supported bits of `XCR0` and `IA32_XSS`.
